definition: to impersonate/to pose as (someone else)/to counterfeit/to palm off (a fake as a genuine)
to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover

sentences.chinese: 假贵族喜欢假冒的奢侈品。

sentences.english: Pictures of the counterfeit and authentic products may be viewed on the FDA press release.
sentences.chinese: FDA新闻通稿中有假冒产品和正宗产品的图片。

sentences.english: The decision could reduce the market for counterfeit and pirated products in China.
sentences.chinese: 这一裁决有可能削弱中国的假冒产品和盗版产品市场。

sentences.english: Fake commodities can bring about great loss to both country and private property.
sentences.chinese: 假冒伪劣商品给国家和个人带来巨大的财产损失。

sentences.english: Now, most of the herb sold is fake and is made with plastic.
sentences.chinese: 现市面上卖的多为假货，用塑胶假冒的。

sentences.english: They accused suspected of producing and selling fake and inferior products, the crime of illegal business operation.
sentences.chinese: 他们指控涉嫌生产和销售假冒伪劣产品，非法经营罪。

sentences.english: But really happy for my Converse shoes bought for 45 RMB in a fake-market.
sentences.chinese: 但是为在假冒市场买到45元的鞋子很开心。

sentences.english: The Chinese government has taken various effective measures to crack down on the counterfeit goods.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府已采取各种有效措施打击假冒伪劣商品。

sentences.english: The impostors pose the latest counterfeiting headache for the tech giant.
sentences.chinese: 假冒者们制造的最新仿制品令科技巨头头痛。

sentences.english: It also authorizes the seizure and destruction of equipment used to manufacture counterfeit goods.
sentences.chinese: 该法还授权没收和销毁用于生产假冒产品的设备。

sentences.english: Woe to you, teachers of the law and Pharisees, you hypocrites!
sentences.chinese: 你们这假冒为善的文士和法利赛人有祸了。

sentences.english: He deceived the shopkeeper into purchasing a large quantity of fake commodities.
sentences.chinese: 他骗店主采购了大量的假冒伪劣商品。

sentences.english: Many evil merchants swindle the customers by imposing fake goods on them .
sentences.chinese: 许多无良商人用假冒伪劣商品坑害消费者。

sentences.english: Crab meat in KFC dish raises stink on the Net.
sentences.chinese: 肯德基用鱼肉假冒黄金蟹斗引发网络骂声一片。

sentences.english: It provided vast market space for the rampancy of sham product.
sentences.chinese: 它为假冒产品的猖厥提供了广阔的市场空间。

sentences.english: Second part is the production and development of theory of reverse passing-off .
sentences.chinese: 第二部分为商标反向假冒理论的产生及发展。

definition: to feign/to pretend to be/to pass oneself off as
to steal sb's valuable item and substitute a similar-looking but worthless item/to sell a fake for the genuine article/to palm off
unidentified origin/no-one knows where it comes from/of dubious background
